summary: The client requested to re-execute Sprint 1 to refresh the foundational elements of the MVP. The Sprint Planning Architect analyzed the backlog, confirmed the relevant user stories (US-010, US-015, US-001), and proposed a re-execution plan focusing on mock authentication and employee management, seeking confirmation before starting.

actions.task: Confirm if the proposed Sprint 1 re-execution matches expectations and approve starting execution

risks.risk: Dependency issues if stories are not executed in the proposed order (login first, then add, then search)
risks.mitigation: Follow the incremental order: US-010 for access, US-015 for data creation, US-001 for retrieval to ensure smooth integration
